To complete your details and sign the agreement, copy this whatsapp message and sign into the application at:

overview.description: is a property rent tracking app that streamlines rent agreements and activity.

roles.title: The app supports two user roles:
roles.landlordsDesc: who manage properties, rental agreements, and activity
roles.tenantsDesc: who complete their details and sign rental agreements

overview.techStack: The app is designed for scalability, utilizing serverless computing and storage, with global content delivery through CloudFront. Built with AWS services, with robust monitoring via AWS CloudWatch and X-Ray, and WebSockets for real-time updates
overview.ui: The app offers an intuitive, mobile-friendly UI/UX
overview.saas: Built as a SaaS solution using Pool Model (Fully Shared) architecture

tenantDocuments.pleaseSignAndShare: Please sign the document and share with the landlord.

signature.tapToStartDrawing: Touch anywhere to begin your signature

welcome.confirmMessage: Please note that this selection is irreversible. To use the application with a different user type, you will need to sign in with another email account.
welcome.confirmCheckbox: I understand that this selection is irreversible and will require a different email for another user type
welcome.title: Welcome to RENTracker
welcome.subtitle: AWS/React/WebSockets-based application.
welcome.description: The app supports two user roles: Landlords who manage properties, rental agreements, and activity, and Tenants who complete their details and sign rental agreements.
welcome.selectRole: Please select your role to continue:
welcome.landlordsDesc: Manage properties, rental agreements, and activity
welcome.tenantsDesc: Completes personal details and signs rental agreements
